alert.note: Alert for Northern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 10:53PM MDT until April 12 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Gusty northeast winds between 15 and 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph will develop late evening. * WHERE...Elk River, Highway 11 Pierce to Headquarters, and Pierce. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
